tagline: ...we are what we eat, our pets too....
message: If you have difficulties in choosing the necessary pet products, our managers will be happy to advise you.
conditions: You can order pet products 24 hours a day on the website, following the usual registration procedure, or by phone during business hours. Regular customers receive a accumulative discount card that will allow you to significantly save money. And our prices will definitely please you if you compare them with other online pet stores. In addition, if you are the owner of a kennel, then a 10% discount is already yours!
